text:
Hello. I'm Jennifer from English 
with Jennifer. Welcome to my channel,
where I deliver lessons from the heart.

My goal is to create quality content to 
help you communicate more confidently

and effectively in English. 
I teach American English,

and my online materials support both students 
and teachers. Follow me on social media.

Be sure to use my playlists so that you can 
target the skills and topics you need most:

listening, speaking, reading, writing, 
grammar, pronunciation, vocabulary,

and American culture. The complete list of 
videos is on my website englishwithjennifer.com.

Please subscribe to my channel so that 
you receive notification of new videos

and special live events. I also invite you 
to join the English with Jennifer community

right here on YouTube. If you see 
the JOIN button on my channel,

that means that the membership 
program is available in your country.

Click join to learn how you can get regular 
practice beyond my videos for only $1 a month.

For live interaction, high intermediate and 
advanced students can join me on Patreon
@englishwithjennifer. Visit my page to view

all the amazing perks I can offer 
to support your language studies.

Even other English language teachers have become 
part of my Patreon program, and I welcome you.

I love teaching, and I love helping 
people reach their language goals.

I want you to love the learning experience, so I 
wish you all happy studies! Follow me on Facebook,

Twitter, and Instagram. Why not join me on 
Patreon? And don't forget to subscribe on YouTube.
